## Operators

### Asignment Operators
```{r}
# <-
# =
# <<-

a <- 1
a
a = 9
a

```
### Aritmetic Operators

```{r}
9*9
56-5
34/3
14+6
a <- 13
b <- 2
a/b
```
### Logical Operators

```{r}
# x | y 
# x & y

data <- 1:10
data

data[data > 4]

```
### Matematical Operations

```{r}
# As a Calculator
# +,-,/,*,^
# log,log10,log2

sqrt(16)
abs(-19)

a <- sqrt(9)
b <- log(a)
c <- log2(b)
c

log2(log(sqrt(9)))

```
